trends: There has been one other sighting in Alamo
There were no other sightings in Alamo on or around January 9th 2001
divs: Sighting Detailswow,don't know where to begin,i've seen 3 single objects at different times in my life,i had seen a formation of discs(5),i supposedly been abducted(doctor told me),i've seen ghosts,experienced the paranormal,and today am wondering why no one is looking for the truth,they say they are but it's just about the ratings.....i write to people with no response,so maybe someone can write me so i can tell my story...by the way i know ariel ships are flying in the infrared spectrum and until someone films the event,maybe even with a forward-looking infrared camera,we can finally get the truth...please respond....i'm trying to get someone's attention....who wants to listen.........."J"
